landing.title: RPG Survey Creator
landing.subtitle: Create surveys for your tabletop RPG campaigns
landing.description: Help your Game Master understand your preferences and create the perfect campaign for your group.
landing.gmDescription: Create surveys, share with players, and view responses
landing.playerDescription: Complete surveys to help your GM plan the perfect campaign

auth.signInError: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials.
auth.signUpError: Failed to create account. Please try again.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

dashboard.title: My Surveys
dashboard.noSurveys: You haven't created any surveys yet
dashboard.getStartedMessage: Create your first survey to gather player preferences
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this survey? This cannot be undone.

create.title: Create New Survey
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell players what this survey is for...
create.supportedLanguagesHelp: Players will be able to complete the survey in these languages

share.title: Share Your Survey
share.instructions: Share this link with your players

complete.title: Player Survey
complete.welcomeMessage: Help your GM create the perfect campaign
complete.nameRequired: Please enter your name before submitting
complete.nameRequiredHelp: Required - helps the GM identify your response
complete.submitted: Thank you for completing the survey!
complete.submittedMessage: Your responses have been recorded. Your GM will use this information to craft an amazing campaign.
complete.surveyInactive: This survey is no longer active

languageProficiency.title: Language Proficiency
languageProficiency.description: Rate your proficiency in each language for this campaign
languageProficiency.level0: No Knowledge - I don't speak this language

validation.pleaseAnswerAll: Please rate your proficiency in all languages

results.title: Survey Results
results.noResponsesMessage: Share your survey link with players to start collecting responses
results.playerNote: This summary shows aggregated preferences from all players. Individual names are kept private.

insights.title: Group Insights
insights.needMoreResponses: Need at least 2 responses to generate group insights and recommendations.
insights.noConsensus: No strong consensus yet. Players have diverse preferences.
insights.noConflicts: No major conflicts detected. The group seems well aligned!
insights.correlationPositive: Players who rate one higher tend to rate the other higher
insights.correlationNegative: Players who rate one higher tend to rate the other lower

sessionZero.mixedExperience: Mixed experience levels ({{min}}-{{max}}) - discuss pacing and teaching
sessionZero.multipleTonePreferences: Multiple tone preferences selected - clarify expectations
